/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the glow of a bright sun. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the urban landscape. The street is teeming with cars and buses, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sun's rays. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the city's architectural diversity. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a warm and sunny day. The sun itself is positioned in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light.
